main.name: Bereket Zergaw
main.description: Success is my duty, obligation, and responsiblity!
main.bio: Hi there! I am Bereket!  I've been coding for over 3 years now starting from university at ICT incubation center. One year professional experience as junior software developer and system trainer. I have been participated to three projects to BenaSoft System PLC for college management system as requirment engineer and front end developer, electronic library management system as database designer and ERP system as system technical trainer.

address.state: Around Mobile Sefer (Able to move to Addis Ababa)

work.title: Junior software developer and Customer Service Expert
work.description: Worked on web application projects for school and college management system. Deployment of BenaSoft ERP and MaleNet student information management system.

testimonials.text: Bereket is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
testimonials.user: Mr. Habtamu Abraham | Founder & CEO of Malef Drug & Medical Wholesale
